TimelineContent.heroTitle: Ngiyisiqalo esisuka England okwamanje sihambo eziindawo ehlukene ku-US/UK/EU nge-AirBnb's. Uba nomvumelwano ekrpypto, ekusungulweni nokuthuthukiswa kwesoftware. Nemnaungo yokwenza imali ku-venture capital nokulingisa.
TimelineContent.timeline2025Title: Ilunswe i-LiquidOps mainnet futhi kugxile ekuthuthukiseni
TimelineContent.timeline2025Description: Le nyaka ngichitile isikhathi sami elunseni i-[LiquidOps' mainnet](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1905268807746060790?s=20). Kunye nemifundo ebaluleke kakhulu engifundayo le nyaka ukuthi ama-startup akuwona konke amathuba weproduct. Okukhulayo kanye ne-marketing kubaluleke kancane (noma kaningizwane kakhulu) kunokweproduct, ngakho ngiqale [ukudala okuqukethwe](/projects#content-creator) futhi ngagxile ekuthuthukiseni.
TimelineContent.timeline2024Description: Ngibuthe umbono [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops) nomnumzane [Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer) ngonyaka omusha emva kwokuhamba okwilenileni okuhle kakhulu e-Cambridge lapho ngihlala khona ngaleso sikhathi. [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) wawusembuzinini futhi sigcolile ngezwile nayo umthwalo womkhankaso wokwakha izinkomo zesikwelethi. Ngikhuphuze njengoEngineer Partner ku-[AO Ventures](https://aoventures.io). Ngasize amatimu ekohorthi futhi ngandulela ukuthi ubani obefakwa kumdlalo wamathuluzi ngokwenkinga yethekinoloji, ekugcineni nangiyazamela nomcabango wami omsha - [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops).
TimelineContent.timeline2023Description: Ngaba umuntu wokuqala wase-External Fellow ku-[Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) ngesikhathi sinye emva kwezilinganiso zawo. Ngabuyisela isikhela se-[Wallety](/projects#wallety) uphethe igxilele ekopho lonke le-[Arweave](https://arweave.org). Ngesikhathi sangikhona sengakha [Othent](/projects#othent), iOases nemisebenzana engu-[Subsidise.js](/projects#subsidisejs).
TimelineContent.timeline2022Title: Ngajoyine i-Community Labs futhi ngazifundo kodwa ukubhala amakhodi
TimelineContent.timeline2022Description: Ngemuva kokuqaphela ukuthi ukugunyaza akugqugquzeli kimi kakhulu njengobukhali, ngachitha isikhathi sami ngolwazi lokufunda ikhodi kusuka ekuqaleni. Ngawo amazwi emangalisayo, ngafunda ikhodi ngokushesha kakhulu futhi ngakha umsebenzi wami wokuqala [i-Wallety](/projects#wallety). Bekuyimizamo enkulu kodwa yayinothando. Ngemuva kwalokho, ngalamathela indingilizi ka-[uTate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) owaba umngani wami oqinile futhi ngasala ukuthi ngijoyine enhlanganisweni yakhe ku-[Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) njengomlingani wabo wokuqala ovela ngaphandle.
TimelineContent.timeline2021Title: Ngabutha ekubeni yi-Crypto VC esuka ebhedini elami
TimelineContent.timeline2021Description: Ngafumana isithi sikhwelezi esikhayeleko kugwazinaphandle fungondo wokwenza imali we-crypto ngezethembiso zakuqala zenyanga. Ngikhethele iminyaka emithathu ngaphandle kokubhathaliswa ngaphandle, emva kwaloko bathula ukufa isikhundla esithintwe imali, ngikhuphuze izinkomo zawo zenkosi nokuphethe izindingilizane eziningi. Ngachithe isikhathi sengenzela okuqala ukuqinisekeza ukuthi indlela yokubhathaliswa, ngoba nginika imibono ebhalwe ezethu zocwaningo lokufakwana nomushokaphandle nomkhosi. Ngonyaka omusha ngikhuphuze i-[Polkadot Ambassador](https://polkadot.com/community/ambassador-program) apho ngikhusela ekwakheni umphakathi futhi ngihlela i-Londoni e-IRL epikini lapho abantu babangu-100 noma ngaphezu kwayo wafika okuhlanganisa amatimu ekanokishi nabasunguli.
TimelineContent.timeline2020Description: Ngesikhathi ngihlela ukusibheka ku-[Emil Dale Academy](https://www.emildale.co.uk), ngaqala ishaneli se-TikTok ye-Crypto elimelele ukufundisa iGen Z nge-Crypto. Ukuze ngibuthe ekusiphandle kweshikhali ngagqiba ngokusebenzisa imeyili elingenani 500 amaziyo, izithinteli zekhadi nezitshelo nangabe bazongaweli nami umuntu ongasebenza. Ngaphambi kokulingana okuvela kwamazwi angu-500 ngakho-6 azamathe. Ngisoze ngisibele okushayizinhlokweni eZoom ngasempahleni weshkola ngeselfoni yabafowundi elinalinkqubo uyanya ngokutsatsa amasheshe kumakhosi nankuphethe azikhundla zokubhathaliswa nami. Kwakuyinto embi kakhulu ephakeme nami bese kuyenzeka kahle kakhulu sida. Ngonyaka lomu ngikhuphuze isikhungo-sizindlu seShkala soKusibheka ngokuhlanganisa izimpahla zakagvada zabantu ukuzimncinzela ku-eBay ungahlawula ngesondlo sokuqesha emva kokufumana u-Gary Vee, kwakusebenza!
TimelineContent.timeline2019Description: Ngajoyine umphakathi we-Ethereum ngo-2019 emva kokufumanisa ngezikhundla ezinzima.
TimelineContent.timeline2017Description: Ngesikhathi abangane bami bonke babebethengisa amakhandy noma kunini, ngikhuphuze izisikini zefounu ngezimali.
TimelineContent.photo2025_7: Eminyakeni engu-22 futhi emali ka-¬£20k yisipho
TimelineContent.photo2020_1: Ukuthenga izimpahla eziphindwayo ukuze kulindiswe eshkola
TimelineContent.timeline2026Description: Ngonyaka yobo uLiquidOps wathole i-[Astro](https://www.astrousd.com/), eyasungulwa umngani wami omuhle u-[Kadar Sayed Abdi](https://x.com/0xKadar).

AngelPage.title: Ukusumuluza ingilazi
introAndElevator: Ngiyathanda ukuhlangana nabakali bezisani abasikela okuthinta. Ngoba ngibona ikhono nobuhle obungangenza isikhele sokukhulu, nguthando lokunjengwa kuzalwane.

Ngokukahle ngibhala amacheki aphakathi no-**$500 kanye no-$5,000** ebunzimeni bokuhambela nokuthula kwesizindlu. Noma nganele amacheki amakhulukhulu, ngilinzile ukuba usizo. Noma kusho ukuqala okutsha, imininingwane emhlophe, insingizi yethekinoloji, noma ibe nomunye onokubethela imibuzo, buka emuva nemininingwane emkhulu ngokuthi uthini ngezansi.

Ukubika, ngilomuntu osebenza ngekhadi lokusheshe futhi ngifuna ukube noma ngabe nosekelo ebusulwanini basemva, ngakho angikhonanga ukwabelana ngesikhathi siphiwe ekugcineni. Ngokuhle kuphela ngubuntu bezisani abasisebenzeli obumpilo obunjengoba ngibhala okulola ngakho, ngakho ngikhone tukulandela umkhankaso. Buka okwengeziwe [angel investing disclosures](/disclosures).
helpItems: Angikhonanga ukukunika umusho ngezemibuzo zomthetho/izikhali, kodwa ngingakukhomba abakwazi lokubhangela - olawu, abahlanganisa abantu, nababonisi (futhi ngisikele ukuthi akukubanini abazibeke emini). Ngayamkhona ngale iminyaka ngibuthe amaziyo amaningi amakhulukhulu e-UK futhi i-Delaware C corporation.
Ngazifunde uba ngumuntu ozizwa libo okukhulu kunoma yini emapajini enilinzweni
Ngilinzile amatimelo amancane alethule angakwenza ngeshweshwe
Ngiluphakamisile amaciklo amancane okuthola imali kuva-VCs, i-accelerators, izilingo zesizinyo, nezintelu zothuntu ezihlanganisiwe
Ngikhupe emaprojekthini/ve-VCs/izinkampani futhi ngibeke umuntu onkinga, kuhlanganisa iCEO, inzingisi, umhlanganisi, incwadi ye-COO nethekinoloji yomuntu ozenzela.
Njengoba ungakwazi ukubona ku-websayiti yami, ngiyi-SCRAPPY. Yikugcina engisebenzisa nayo futhi ngubuntu ongivumelekeza ukuba sisisondlule.
Ngilunsele umzimu wabantu owawu-thousands okushayizindlu futhi wakhula kuya ku-$55m kwizipho ezikhakile
Ngibuthe/ngakha/ngalunsela izinto ezimiswini eziningi emaprojekthini nenkampani
Ngakha izikhali zethekinoloji, izinkomo, nezikhali zokushayizindlu ngokuphumuza futhi ngokuze ezingagundi
AngelPage.pressureTitle: Ngathole Izinkinga Ngaphansi Kokuncinzwani futhi Ngizisokunqunga
pressureItems: Ngarungile izinkinga ezingu-2 ezikhulu ekuphahla kusisteri ye-DeFi ye-mainnet elifihlakele
Ngikhulumele phambi kwelingwela elaphakile/e-inthanethi futhi ngisele ngakuqala nokusona ezinkomo
Ngathola i-IP, ngathengisela i-IP, futhi ngathambuza amakampeni
Ngakhe amatimu futhi ngashu futhi shlela abafazi bokuthi abanginiki
Ngasheshe nabahlanganisi bomthetho, olawu, abahlanganisa abantu, nenkampani yokukubuza amakhosi
Ngafonele amakampeni/abantu ngokuphumo (ngalezintsuku ngihlokomela ukufaka imibono ewele)
Ngasho ukufa kuya-1-1 umyalelo omubi futhi ngimukelakala amakhothi ambalwa
Ngadlulisa futhi ngacindile abakali bezisani nenkampani abakembi
Ngikhuphuze amakampeni amahle, amakampeni abakubi, ngakhe amahle, futhi ngarungile amakampeni ami okubuka amakhothi ambalwa
Embuzinini yangaphambi ngikhuphuze umsibayizikali. Ngingakusiza ukuba ubukeka umuntu owangempilweni sokusetsenziswa nokusho khona
Ngabakhula i-VC pitches futhi ngakuhle kakhulu lokuhlukunyezwa
Ngasheshe umkhankaso womuntu wokuqala-umuntu umkhulu ambalqa
Ngahlu futhi ngasho amakhothi amankenkane okukholisa, ngokufanele ngoku kuthi umuntu uthine imithwalo kuqokwe usanda nokusho
Ngikhupa amakhothi emizweni enengi futhi ngibuthe amakhothi amahle kwezindingilizane
Ngicame nokuhlela amakhothi (ngakho akufaneli ngokukubhangela, umuntu omubi)
Ngikhupe amathuluzi futhi ngakha amathuluzi olayeza njengo-Figma futhi Webflow
AngelPage.mistakesTitle: Iziphiwo Ezikhulu Engizikhulula Engikhusa Ukuthi Akuwenzhiwe
mistakesItems: Ngathwala imali engaphezu kwe-$50k USD ekulungisweni kwemiphumela yomzali ovuthiwe owawungaba ngu-$5k
Ngathwala imali eyi-$75k USD kuhlolohulelweni lwemveliso engakakafiki esigabeni semarket-fit
Ngathwala unyaka wakho wokwakha umkhiqizo futhi ngangafoci ngokuphelele ekungathandeni nokumemezela
Ngavala isimbilo setaks esasikhohlisa konke okokulobola kwami nasabumuntu futhi yangidlulisela kunuma networth ye-$60k kunezikweleti
Ngazichimeleza kakhulu isigwegwe sami sakredithi nezezimali zasabumuntu njengumsunguli, bese ngakumsungula
Ngakhohlwa inValue yedola kunokuthi iyena yendlela ekade iyasebenza
Ngalahlela izinkulungwane zedola emalini evela kumiphutha engenkanya njengokusebenzisa isofthiwe engalungile
Ngakha indlela yokuzikhethela kanobuntu futhi ngayilahla
AngelPage.astroDescription: I-Astro yenzela ekukhululiseni ukulawula izintshalo zeblokicheni njengomkhani weintabaliki ezibekile.
AngelPage.velaventuresDescription: Istudio ye-Web3 venture emuva kwezinhlelo zokusebenza ezifana [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com), [Vento](https://ventoswap.com/?tab=swap) futhi [AO Sync](https://github.com/vela-ventures/ao-sync-sdk).
AngelPage.upshotDescription: Indawo yokuqala emhlabeni yomuzi wepeso eliphakeme, eyakhelwe kumphakathi we-Base.
AngelPage.saySoDescription: Umkholo wokubikezela we-Web3 owakhelwe ku-Sei blockchain ecosystem.
AngelPage.plasmaOrbitalDescription: Inkampani yokukhiqiza i-micro satellite network yokuqopha ulwandle.

content.content: Ipheji elilodwa leli liqukethe izindikimba ezibalulekile mabangela iwenkeli yokutshala imali. Ngezikweleti uzazi lonke ulwazi olungu-ngakumamelana nami mayelana nezikhalazo eziwenzekayo.
Amalungelo Kabumuntu Kuphela

Ngitshala imali yami yabumuntu. Angiwona **isikhanda** sokumisela ezimali, **angabusi** umkhosi, futhi **angatereza** amalungelo avela ezinkamboni ezimiselwe nomas izakwabo ezemali. Konke ukucidwa kwezitshalo kwenziwa yimi kuphela usebenzisa imali yami.
Hhayi Ikhanselo Lezitshalo

Akukho nto ku-iwebhusayithi yami okumele kutomelwa njengekhanselo, elilo, ukubala, ikhefu, noma ikhanselo lokushaye impilo. Angiwona **ukunkuluzwe noma ukuhlola** ifayinansi Conduct Authority (FCA) noma nanoma iyiphi ibodi lemuva kwemininingwane. Konke okucidwa kwezitshalo ukucidwa kwakokhona.
Akukho Umthwalo Wobushwantsantsantsantsantsantsantsantsan

Anginalomthwalo wokubhala umthetho kubashali noma amazwe owazela kukhona ngaphandle kwesigwegwe esinazwa endaweni eyalungiswe yokutshala. Ngingemuzi wokutshala, hhayi umlangano, umdlangiso, noma umuntu wemusizi.
Hhayi Isikalo

Akukho nto ku-iwebhusayithi yami okumele kutomelwa njengesikalo, ishokelo, noma isikhalazo sokutshala kumakampani, isilisa, noma umkhiqizo wezitshalo. Konke ulwazi mayelana namakampani ami akuvaliwe kuphela ngamehlo.
Akukho Isiqiniseko Sokutshala
Ukuxhumana nami noma isikhalazo sakho ukusithumela **akusiqinisekile** ukuthi ngizotshal. Ngihlolohuleleza izifundo ngekhethelo futhi ngitosha izinkampani ezimbalwa kuqala ebudeni (i-1-2 kuqala).
Umqondo Omncane

Namanje ngimumsunguli owedlule futhi nginolwazi locele lokuthi ngizoqhubeka njalo, ngakho angikwazi ukunika ikhanselo eliphelele amakampani asokungeza. Nguvamile ngokuphela nge-amakampani ayakha ezindaweni ezifanayo nalezo engilandele emasontweni angidale kuqala, ngakho engiyakola engokudibanisa.
Akukho Ubudlelwano Bolwazi

Angiyazi amakampani noma abashali. Ngiccweka abameli abacela kahle (ngaphandle kwamakampani asetshe) ‚Äî [bulela Steve Jobs kuchaza ukuthi kung](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-c4CNB80SRc). Ngitosha kuphela ababusi nabocwangciso engifuna ukubandakanya kukhona futhi ngicabange ukuthi engiyakola ukubamba.
Ukunikela Kwesigaba Sesandi

Angiwona ukuthi ngizonolusizo kubashali abamele. Ngingesandi yami futhi enginyakamukeleke abantu emasigabeni asandi (ngaphambi kwe-Series A). Kodwa uma ubashali obamele futhi ucabanga ukuthi engiwanganyakamukeleke, nginamdumele.
Izinganekwane Zekhefu

Nanoma yikiphi ikhlofu enikumazwi (njengosizi noma i-EIS) uvaliwe ngesigaba esilungile kunye nemithetho ye-HMRC. Kufanele usekele umcebisi wekhefu ongazimisele. Angimazi nanoma iyiphi izigidimi zekhefu zesitshalo.
Ubusisi

Uma usithumele ulwazi olubambekile, ngizoluthata ngesikhali, kodwa angisiqinisekakale ubusisi obuphelele. Engingakusiswa izicabango ezifanayo evela kubashali abanye. Ungasithumele ulwazi olungakhonolwazi nokwaziswa. Ngaphandle kwesigwegwe samhlanganisweni engasayine nama-imeyili esamhlanganisweni, anginalomthwalo wokubhala ulwazi osilithumele njengolubambekile.
Izingxabano
Engitshala amakampani ayahlangana nomunye nomunye noma amakampani oyakha. Anginalomthwalo wokuveza ezitshalo zami ezokhona, futhi anginalomthwalo wokuzibanalela ekutshalweni kwamakampani ayahlangana.
Ikhono Lezifo

**Okutshalwa kwezinkosi endlela-sesandi kubakompani abadala kunazo konke izifo ekukhona nokunoma azikwami.** Engiyakwazi ukulahla sitshalo sakho sonke. Isikhunjulelo sendlela yesikhathi esedlule ayikushela impilo. Inani lezitshalo litshwa futhi nidlulela. Okutshalwa kwesandi akusebenziswa futhi engiyakwazi ukuthengisa impilo yakho ngemuva neminyaka embalwa, uma.

content.title: Isigaba Somuntu Ozikhethele Engilizweni
content.content: Ngimutu **Umuntu Ozifisele Okukuhlolwa** ngaphansi kwenqubo ye-Imikhakha ye-Fayinansi kunye ne-Amahkethi Act 2000 (Umgomo Wokuthumela Ikhanselo) 2005. Ngiyahlongwa ngesinqumo sokusebenza ngenhloso yefayinansi yamakampani amancane futhi asemidlala ekulobeni eminyakeni emibili edlule (njengomumeme womkhankaso we-blockchain obandakanyela okutshalwa kwesandi).
content.note: **Abashali:** Ngokusithumela imathiriyeli yesitshalo sama, uyaqinisekisa ukuthi wenzile ukuhlola okufanele ngaphansi komgomo wokuthumela ikhanselo lase-UK futhi unengqondo okuzwakalisa ukuthi ngihlongile ukutereza olulwazi onjalo. Uma ufuna ukuthi ngisayine ifomu lokuzikhethela phambi kokusithumela isikhalazo sakho, ngilutalela.

content.content: Uma unemibuzo mayelana nalezi zizindikimba, sicela uxhumane nami ku-heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Isivumelwano Sezimiso
Ngokwamukela nokusebenzisa i-lorimerjenkins.com ("Iwebhusayithi"), uyavuma ukunambikwa yezi Zimiso Zezisebenzisi ("Izimiso"). Uma ungavumi lezi Zimiso, ngezikweleti ungasebenzisi iWebhusayithi.
Incazelo Yezisebenzisa

I-Lorimerjenkins.com iyiwebhusayithi yabumuntu engu-Lorimer Jenkins. I-Iwebhusayithi inazwa mayelana nomsebenzi wami, amaphrojekiti, izinkombindlela yokutshal, fulani esinye isiqalo engikhetha sokwabelana.
Ukusebenziwa Kwe-Iwebhusayithi
Ukusebenziwa Okuhle
Uyavuma ukusebenzisa iWebhusayithi kuphela ngezigwegwe zemithetho futhi ngenethwadi engabakheleli kwehakela lokuthandi noma abantu balungele. Izenzo ezinqatshelwe zibandakanya, kodwa hhayi kuphela:

items: Ukuzama ukuthola amandla okubukeka iWebhusayithi noma amasisitemu ayo
Ukuthumela izillisa, indlela yomlilo, noma ezinye izicwajisi ezikabi kahle
Ukusebenzisal amasisitemu okwenziwa (imibophomvu, izitholi) ngaphandle kemvumelwano
Ukwenxa konke okumiswe emithetho noma umgomo

content.content: Ukufinyelela Kwe-Iwebhusayithi

Ngiyo lo-usebenziso ngoweshwane wobabaza, ngiyo lobona, lobona noma lobukela izicelo zesigaba kesikhashana ngaphandle kweshwane okubukekele, lokubakela amalungele okuvele kuzicelo zesigaba, kanye nomuntu ozukela odlulisela ezi Zimiso.
Ulwazi Lokutshala Ama-Injini

Isigaba esikhulu sokutshala i-Iwebhusayithi sethembelelene ngenhloso yokwaziswa. Akukho nto ku-iwebhusayithi okumele kutomelwa njengekhanselo lokutshala, isishokelo sokuthenge noma ukuthengisa izilisa, noma ikhanselo lokuzimela, elilo, noma okushayile. Angiwona ukunkuluzwe noma ukuhlola ifayinansi Conduct Authority (FCA). Sicela ubheke i-[angel investing disclosures](/disclosures) sami ngokugcina nokukhalela okwengeziwe.
Izithwalo Zalubuhayi

Ngaphandle kwesishwane okusithunywe, konke isigwegwe ku-Iwebhusayithi, ibandakanya kodwa hhayi kuphela umbhalo, izithombe, izithombe ezibalukulukululululuku, ilogu, ividiyo, nekhodi, yingan ngo-Lorimer Jenkins futhi ivernisiwe umgomo wobubuhayi, umarca, funatsho/funatsho olunye lwemigwalo yakucacisa.

Unikezwe umkhayela omncane, ongebizo, ungathengiselwakho ukumusebenzisele futhi wamukela iWebhusayithi ngenhloso yabumuntu, engenzelelwa. Akukho enginike ukuveza, ukusakazela, noma ukubuya isigwegwe iWebhusayithi ngaphandle kwemvumelwano, wenza noma iqedo umsebenzi esitsheni, sebenzise isigwegwe iWebhusayithi ngenhloso enzalelwe, noma ususe umbuzo walubuhayi noma izicelo ezitshiwo esigwegweni.
Izithumelo kunye Nokuxhumana

Uma usithumela izitshizwi zesikhalazo, amapulani ebizinesi, noma olunye ulwazi wami ngekutshi lokutshala: unamathwalo angobawela umangqe, unginikeza umkhayeli ongebizo ukubheka futhi ucuze izitshizwi, anginalomthwalo wokubheka izitshizwi noma ukutshala, engiyakwazi ukunuza izicabango ezifanayo evela ezindlini ezenye, futhi uthwala umthwalo wokuvikela awona ulwazi lwakho lolubambekile.
Inganekwane Lengaphandle

I-Iwebhusayithi ingabandakanya izixhumanisi kuwebhusayithi yamathathathi noma esinye. Lezi zixhumanisi zithembeleleke ngamahle. Angiwona umthwalo osigwegwe, ukucacisa, noma izenzaniso zezindawo ezengaphandle, nanoma izikhala evela ekusebenzisweni kokunye, noma izikhala kubakho kwazo.
Isinqiso Somthetho Sokusebenziselwa

**I-IWEBHUSAYITHI ITHEMBELELEKE KUNSIZAKUSEBENZISA "NJENGOBA KULOMELE" FUTHI "NJENGOBA OKUTHOLA" NGAPHANDLE KWESIQUMEQISZE SOMEHLUKO**, noma okufiswa futhi, ibandakanya kodwa hhayi kuphela siqumeqisze sesebenzo, isiqiniselo senhloso ethile, ukuthi iWebhusayithi izokubikezelwa, ilungile, noma itholike, noma ngekutshi ukucacisa, ukuthembeka, noma okuphelele kwesigwegwe.
Umthwalo Wokugcwala

**NGOKUKHANGELA OKWENGEZIWE OKUMITHWALO NEMITHETHO, LORIMER JENKINS AYILALI NENHLAMVU YANOMA IYIPHI** izifo ezingathixile, eziphakamele, ezikombile, eziphelele, noma eziphakamiswe, amathuthuluko amathini, intela, idathela, noma umsebenzi, amathuthuluko avela ekusebenzisweni kwayo iWebhusayithi, amathuthuluko ekutshalweni, noma amathuthuluko ovela ekuthembeni solwazi ku-iWebhusayithi yile.

Lokhu kumlisela kusebenzela nanoma iyiphi imibono lemithetho futhi noma kunjalo engilungisweni ngale ekusibone amaveza enziwe. **Kanoma iyiphi okwenzeka angeke umthwalo wami wonke ulende inani owayikhokhe ukumusebenzisele iWebhusayithi (okukubalile kungu-zero).**
Ukuthembela

Uyavuma ukunake, ukuvikela, kanye nokuphakela i-Lorimer Jenkins kwizinganekwane, amathuthuluko, amathuthuluko, okuthandi, kanye nezikhali evela ekusebenzisweni kwayo iWebhusayithi, ukwenxa kwezimiso zayo, ukwenxa kwanoma iyiphi yehakela lokuthandi komuntu, nanoma iyiphi okucidwa okutshala, noma namakhu ubathumela.
Ubusisi
Ukusebenziwa kwakokhona kwe-Iwebhusayithi kuphathelene futhi ne-[Umgomo Wamahle](/privacy), okubonakaliswa ngokukuphathelela kumgomo kubuswane nokucushela.
Ubabaza Bize Zimiso

Ngiyo lo-usebenziso nokubabaza ezi Zimiso nganoma iyiphi isikhathi. Ubabaza zizoba amandla akwekhoniphela ngo-post engiphose okusikhulu "Last Updated". Ukuqhubeka kwakokhona nokumuhaza iWebhusayithi ngemuva kubabaza niyiqasha lesi Zimiso lesibopheziwe.
Umithetho Okusetshabela

Ezi Zimiso zizosetshabelwa kwaye zivunyelwe kusehlela umithetho yase-Engilandi kanye neWelshi. Nanoma iyiphi izingxabano zizoxazululwa ngokuxhumana okuhle, futhi uma lokho likwazile, amagumbi e-Engilandi kanye neWelshi azoba nokulinga okukhethekile.
Ukuhlukunyezwa
Uma isigwegwe lesi Zimiso sitholakala engasetshile noma engalindelekile, esigwegwe esalikelwano sizoqhubeka ngomthwalo ophelele futhi ukusetshabelweni.
Uxhumane Nami
Uma unemibuzo ngesi Zimiso, sicela uxhumane nami ku-heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Ngokusebenziwa kwe-Iwebhusayithi, uyavuma ukuthi ufundile, uthandeke, futhi uvumelene nokusetyenziselwa yi-Zimiso Zezisebenzisa.
Inkulumo

Wamukela ku-lorimerjenkins.com ("Iwebhusayithi"). Umgomo Wamahle uchaza ngokufa i-Lorimer Jenkins ("Mina," "Mina," noma "Yami") ethola, isebenzisa, futhi ikakhela ulwazi noma ubukubuka iwebhusayithi yabumuntu yile.
Ulwazi Engitholayo
Ulwazi Oluthotholakele Ngokukhozo
Noma ubukubuka iWebhusayithi, ngitohlela ulwazi oluthile ngezinkohliso kuGoogle Analytics, ibandakanya:

items: Amapheji owakubuka futhi isikhathi osithuthukisele epheji ngemwenga

content.content: Ulwazi Onikela
Njengamanje, iWebhusayithi ayitholeli ulwazi lobu bubumuntu kuqala evela kubasisita isikhala noma iakhauntu, ngaphandle kokulandelayo:

**Isikhalazo Sokutshala Ama-Injini:** Uma uxhumane nami ngekutshi lokutshala ama-injini kukhona nge-imeyili, engiyakutholela futhi ngihindela ulwazi oyikhethile ukuthola, ibandakanya igama lakho, ikheli le-imeyili, ulwazi lwekampani, izitshizwi zesikhalazo, futhi nanoma iyiphi olunye ulwazi olungu-izithubuzo zokuxhumana.
Ukusebenziwa Kwami Kwayo Ulwazi

Ngikunzwa ulwazi oluthotholakele ngezinkohliso ze-Google Analytics ukuze ngibuze ubani owakubuka iWebhusayithi ngalesi, ibabaza isigwegwe kunye nokusebenziselwa umuntu, ucuze izinto zenziwa emaphethini atrafiki, funathwa umsebenzi we-Iwebhusayithi.

Ngikunzwa ulwazi oluthini ngakukhula isikhalazo sokutshala ama-injini ukucuza izinkezelo lokutshala lokukhula, ukuxhumana nabashali, kanye nokuhlindela ubukhala lokuthumano lokuxhumana lokutshala ama-injini.
Google Analytics

Iwebhusayithi yile isebenzisa i-Google Analytics, isebenzisa sawebo ye-analytics etholakale i-Google LLC. I-Google Analytics isebenzisa ama-cookie ukusekelela ukuhlalela umuntu okhulu ozama iWebhusayithi. Ukwazi okwengeziwe ngendlela i-Google isebenzisa idatha, sicela ubheke: [Umgomo Wamahle i-Google](https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites)
Ukukhipha Kungo
Ungazokhipha i-Google Analytics nge-[Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on](https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout) noma ngokubabaza isetingi yensesha yakho ukuzokhiya noma ukususa ama-cookie.
Ama-Cookie

Ama-cookie amathubula etheksti agcinwe nesisitemu sakho. Iwebhusayithi yile isebenzisa ama-cookie kuphela ngokuxhumana ne-Google Analytics ngenhloso echazwe ngenhla. Ungabiza izinkohliso zekhuki lapho kusisetingi yensesha yakho.
Ukuhlindela Kwedatha

Idatha ye-Google Analytics ibalelene no-26 nyanga evela osukwini lokulungiswa, kumuva emuva osondelayo ikhiye kukhona. Ulwazi oluthini ngakukhula isikhalazo sokutshala ama-injini ibalelene ngazo ezinye lokuthola noma njengoba kuninzelwe ngomithetho.
Ukuxhumana Kokutshala Ama-Injini
Uma usithumela izitshizwi zesikhalazo noma olunye ulwazi lokuthumano lokutshala ama-injini:

items: Engiyakwazi ukwabelana ulwazi abafakazi bambilini okuhusene kwemigomo ephakamiswe, lapho okunabkayo
Angithengi noma njengokwabelana ulwazi kwabathathathi okwenziwe benitheshile ngenhloso yokuthumela

content.content: Inganekwane Yethathathi Ezesithathu
Iwebhusayithi ingabandakanya izixhumanisi kuwebhusayithi yamathathathi. Angiwona umthwalo wezinhlanzo zezikimu zalawezindawo ezengaphandle. Nginxumela ukubheka amagwegwe abo amahle.
Amalungele Akho

Ngokusehlela indawo yakho, engiyakwazi ukuzikhethela amalungele ethile ngekutshi idatha, ibandakanya amalungele okuthola ulwazi engigcinayo ngewe, okuthi bule ikhiye idatha yakho, ukulunga ukusebenziselwa, kanye nokuluhlosela kodatha. Ukuzama lawa malungele, sicela uxhumane nami ku-heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Abavakashi Be-EU (GDPR)

Uma uhlala Umbutho Wase-Europe, unamalungele angakwazi ngaphansi koMgwalo Wokukakela Kwedatha Yomjikelezo (GDPR). Intukhwala eliso yokucubula idatha yakho bubuntu elihle sokubabaza futhi kuhlalela iWebhusayithi, futhi sokuthumano lokutshala ama-injini, inhlo eliso elihle sokucubula izinkezelo lokutshala lokukhula.
Abavakashi Base-California (CCPA)

Uma ungumuntu waseCalifornia, unamalungele agaphansi koMgwalo Wokukhakhela Umuntu KaseCalifornia (CCPA), ibandakanya amalungele okwazi ukuthola ulwazi lobu bubumuntu kanye namalungele okukhalazo ikhiye idatha.
Ubusisi Babantwana

Iwebhusayithi ayilulungiselele abantwana abagcina u-18 ebudeni. Angitholi ngombono ulwazi lobu bubumuntu kusuka kubantwana abangaphansi kwe-18. Uma ucabanga engitholile ulwazi olunjalo ngaphandle kowalwazi, sicela uxhumane nami ukulukhiye.
Ubabaza Umgomo Yile
Engiyakuthi ngibabaze Umgomo Wamahle ngesikhathi. Konke ubabaza buzothweswa epheji yile engenzenzela "Last Updated" okushintshile.
Ukuphekamizelwa

Ngemuva kokuzama ukukhakela ulwazi wakho, nanoma iyiphi indlela yokuthumano phezu kwe-intheneti akusebenza % okuphelele okusikali. Angisiqinisekakale ubusisi obuphelele bulwazi olithunywe noma eligcinwe ku-Iwebhusayithi.
Uxhumane Nami
Uma unemibuzo ngale Umgomo Wamahle, sicela uxhumane nami ku-heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Ngokusebenziwa kwe-Iwebhusayithi, uyavuma ukulungela kanye nokusebenziselwa kwulwazi njengoba kuchazwe kule Umgomo Wamahle.

ProjectsPage.title: Amaprojekti
ProjectsPage.roleAstro: CEO ngemuva kokulandelwa, futhi ngiyi-angel ye-pre-seed
ProjectsPage.walletyDescription: Iwebsayithi ye-[Polkadot](https://polkadot.com) & [Kusama](https://kusama.network/) ecosystem analytics, eniliswa ukukhombisa abasebenzisi uhlelo olulungile mayelana ne-wallet yabo njengokusetshenziswa, okusetshenziswa nyanga ngazinye, i-CSV export kanye nemali ebhadalwe kumaphutha ewenethiwoki. Ngakulungisela i-2 grants kusuka ku-[Kusama DAO](https://dune.com/substrate/kusama-gov), ezabuyiswa kamuva njengoba ngafuna ukujoyina i-[Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com/).
ProjectsPage.othentDescription: Umgomo we-[Othent](https://othent.io) wawukuya ukukhovela umuntu womvelo womuntu online ukuze afike emaprojekthini weblokicheni, ngaphandle kokusebenzisa amakhiyeli ekwizwe okothile futhi kunama-Oauth angakhethekelile njengoGoogle. Ngimusika umgomo njengomuntu wokuqala wase-External Fellow okuphakamiswano weiskhala ku-[Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), inkampani yokwakha isofthawele eyakhelwe ngu-[Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) ku-[Arweave](https://arweave.org) ecosystem. [Othent](https://othent.io) yabe ithathwe i-[Wander](https://wander.app) iye ezinkundlane zayo, i-[Arweave](https://arweave.org) ne-[AO](https://ao.arweave.net) ecosystem Web3 wallet engazindlela ezingaphansi kwami abantu, okuba [Wander Connect](https://www.wander.app/connect).
ProjectsPage.liquidOpsDescription: Iprotocol yokweboleka nokukwebolekisa iyakhiwe ku-[AO](https://ao.arweave.net), eniliswa ukunikeza amavelu amaphethe ngu-$400m we-[Arweave](https://arweave.org) tokens. Ngasama-co-founder iproject nge-[Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer), naba-1st Fellow led company ukusukela ku-[Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), akuthola izinkulumo eziningi ze-[waitlist](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1863863983498805473?s=20) signings eza-grow ziye ku-$55m soft-commits yomqondo nge-on-chain fund verification, [pitched](https://x.com/aoTheVentures/status/1813676139795374171?s=20) ku-[AO Ventures](https://www.aoventures.io) demo day bese ukulungisela [$325k pre-seed round](https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/revolutionizing-defi-how-lorimer-jenkins-marton-lederer-are-transforming-arweave-liquidops-1729945). Silungsile mainnet, sinezingatshelo eziningi ezifaka i-AO Chrome/IOS/Android wallets [Wander](https://wander.app) ([demo nansi](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ODxijaC0Dc)) & [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com) ([demo nansi](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GeQ01-rBUPQ&t=11s)). Siphinde sagcina futhi saphumela kuaudits ezingubani abayi-[Spearbit](https://cantina.xyz/solutions/spearbit) & [Quantstamp](https://quantstamp.com/).
ProjectsPage.contentCreationDescription: Ngilikha okuqukethwe kwevidiyo kuzo zonke izinkundla zokuxhumana ezinkulu. Ngilunga lokuthi lokhu kube indlela enhle yokwakha umphakathi wami we-inthanethi, ukubonisa umhlaba lokho engihlanganiswano nakho futhi ukuhlangana nabantu abasha ezindaweni ezintsha. Naphakathi nalokho, ngaqalisa i-podcast ebizwa nge-[Lorimer's Podcast](/#podcast).
ProjectsPage.cryptoTeenDescription: [Crypto Teen](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer__jenkins) yishaneli ye-TikTok yekrpto ozame ukufundisa iGen Z ukuthi ithini i-crypto, okuhlanganisa umaphedu osisekela nokuthola okuthinta kusheluzi wokuthinta weblokicheni.
ProjectsPage.subsidisejsDescription: Subsidise JS yipakethe eyakhelwe ukukunikeza [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) ukuze ibhendle okuthinta okuthinte futhi kulunge ngesahlukano okuthinta okunye okuthinte kusetshenziswa i-[ANS-102](https://github.com/ArweaveTeam/arweave-standards/blob/master/ans/ANS-102.md) Arweave network standard. Ngikhompile ukusingeza lokhu kwesinye amaprojekti ozame ukunikeza okuthinta okuthinte nokuthinta, okube abathuzi abasheshele ukuthi bathandiwe amakhi AR ukuze basebenzise umhlelo wohlelo we-Web 2 ecinsiswe kuArweave.
ProjectsPage.astroDescription: Astro yisixazululo senselele esakhelwe ekulingsanweni okunzima ekupakamiseni Web3. Ngokuphoqela ama-stablecoins ambalwa nemali yesihlalwe nokuthanta yoke - USDA, Astro iyonela okuthwala kwenani okunzeneza phakathi kwendawo yokwazi nokusebenzisa ekumbaleni.
ProjectsPage.coolarweaveaddressDescription: Le ripho ikukhungisa ukubutha amaningi [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) ukuze kutholwe imiphumela emihle nokuthanya kwekheli. uClaude uzobutha kwakunye imiphumela emihle okukala okukhonjwe.
ProjectsPage.aothecomputerDescription: Umngani wam wanditshela ibali lokuthi akwazile ukunamathela idomeyini elikuninga kakhulu ngentengo encane, kwakumangalisile (futhi ngangishuba kangako) futhi ngakonakala ukumiswa ekucabangeni ngendaba enomuhle engamkele. Ngakho ngibuye ngaqala ukusesha Namecheap ukuze ngibone uma kukhona ezinye izindlu ezinamuhle ezehlolwa. Kuchanganyele [AO The Computer .com](https://aothecomputer.com) kwaba khona ukuxhuma nge-$11.48 phakathi konyaka, thatha lokho [redacted] üòú.
ProjectsPage.aohtmlDescription: AO HTML iyithuluzi elikuvumela ukuthi wenze ikhasi leweb ngomfayela we-HTML owaziswa ngokuzenzakalelayo olulinganiselwe nokuqukethwe okutholakala kunethiwoki ye-AO ngeproses. Cabanga ngesikhwele kwe-decentralised website enokuqukethwe kokunikezwe nge-decentralised provider njengale-DAO, ngokwesibonelo iwebsayithi iyaziswa ngokuzenzakalelayo ngemuva kokugunyaza inkompilo ye-DAO futhi konke i-Web2 front ends ku-Vercel/Netlify nazo zisebenzisa lo script.

WritingPage.title: Ukubhala
WritingPage.substackSignup: Phakamisela ukuthola amaposi ablauni ngokungeneza imeyili.

BookshelfPage.title: Ifu lezincwadi
BookshelfPage.subtitle: Izincwadi ezisize ukwakha inkolelo yami
BookshelfPage.richDadPoorDadAuthorBio: Umuntu ozenzela imali futhi umjezi wefundisa wezintshalo
BookshelfPage.richDadPoorDadNotes: Isingeniso esinhle sokufundisa zezintshalo nokuthinta okothinta okuthinta okothinta.
BookshelfPage.1984Notes: Incwadi ye-dystopian egcina futhi ethathela okuthinta okwalokushalindile ngesikhathi samanje.
BookshelfPage.zeroToOneNotes: Ithumela umhlahlandlela wabasunguli bangokuthi kwakhe okuthinta okuthele futhi bukhe okuthinta ngokugwebu nokuthanta, igwebu okungenela, futhi isikhala amakampeni anentsobo.
BookshelfPage.hardThingNotes: Imasukwi okusho okuthinta ekwakheni nokwenza isigubeni. Akukho okushintshiswe, kuphela okuthinta okwangempela.
BookshelfPage.whatYouDoNotes: Ukuhlalutya okuthinta okuthinte okuthinte okuthinte kusetshenziswa okuthinta-kahle kusukela kuToussaint Louverture kuya kuGenghis Khan.
BookshelfPage.spareNotes: Isibonelo esihle sokuhlala kwe-royal futhi okukhukhula okulindelekile sokuba wokuqala kwelulizikhundla.
BookshelfPage.riseAndFallAuthorBio: Umuntu ozenzela isifundo ekukhethukile futhi umjezi
BookshelfPage.riseAndFallNotes: Ubhiyografi ekubika okuthinta kokumuntu kuPrince Andrew noSarah Ferguson, kusukela ekuzweni lawo ukuya kule mihla.

About.description: Ngiyisazi esinye sefaunda evela e-England okwamanje inomadic kuzungeza i-US/UK/EU e-AirBnb's. Ndinomdla ku-crypto, startups nokuthuthuka kwesoftware. Nginesinbusiso se-venture capital nokusenza. Nami ngngumuntu ozenza okuqukethwe kanye nokuqhuba iphasiwedi ebizwa ngu-[Lorimer's Podcast](/#podcast).
About.tagline: UMUNTU WEZOBUNJINIYELA ‚Ä¢ UMAKHI ‚Ä¢ UMUSUMBI ‚Ä¢ UMNUMZANE WEZIMALI

Podcast.title: Lorimer's Podcast
Podcast.description: Zuza isikhathi kanye nami ukuze sizoxoxa ngokunzulu nabathuthukisi, abamumuzi kanye nabakhi emkhakheni wama-startup. Ngihlola izindaba ezisemva kwemihlahlandlela, izifundo ezafundwe, kanye nesikhathi somabukela sokuthuthuka kwetekinoloji ehlukahlukene.

SubstackSignup.title: Jwayelane
SubstackSignup.description: Joyina inewsletterh yami ukuze uthole amaposi abasha eblogini athunyelwe ngqo kwi-inbox yakho. Ngibhala mayelana nokuxhuma kweshishini, crypto, ukwakha komunye futhi izifundo ezafundwa kuhambo lwami njengo-founder.

FAQ.title: Imibuzo Evamile Ibuziwe
FAQ.a1: Ngumkazi wezifundo owakha i-LiquidOps, iprotocolo yokuboleka nokubolekisa ku-AO. Ngibuyelela nangempela kumakhasimende asaleleke kuthulani futhi ngiyenza okuqukethwe ngemakhompiyeni, i-crypto, nokwakha kuhulumeni.
FAQ.q2: Ingabe ufunekile ukuthi wenze umsebenzi wokubonisisa noma wokukhombisa?
FAQ.a2: Angikwazi umsebenzi wokukhombisa ngoba ngikhumbula ukuthi okukhombiwe kudala akuhlangene. Ngikhetha ukubuyelela nangempela kumakhasimende abangafuni ukwakha nabo.
FAQ.q3: Ngingakuthola kanjani uma ngikuluma ukuze ungibuyelele?
FAQ.a3: Ngithumelele i-imeyili ku-[heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com](mailto:heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com) enomqulu wakho wokubukela. Ngisiko ngibuyelela i-$500-$5,000 emazingeni e-pre-seed ezinkompiyeni ezakha ezindaweni ezinamathuluzi engane nazo.
FAQ.a4: Ngisebenzisa kakhulu i-TypeScript, React, Next.js, kanye nezikhungo ze-blockchain kufaka phakathi i-Arweave ne-AO. Ngingumthuthukeli ofundile ngokwaziwayo okufakade.
FAQ.a5: Ngihlala ngikhangela ukukhuluma nabakhasimende abamangalisayo, abatshali bentengo, nabakhi. Fika nge-imeyili ku-[heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com](mailto:heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com) enolwazi oluqondene nawe kanye nokukhuluma nako.

FilmsPage.title: Amabhaisikobho Nomabhangabhanga
FilmsPage.subtitle: Incwajizo yami yokubuyekeza amabhaisikobho nomabhangabhanga
FilmsPage.marginCallDescription: Ithalu ethambile ehlanganiselwe ngesikhathi esingenhla kwehora elilodwa elingaphandle kwenkundla yokuqalisa imali kwengcindezi yenkundla eminyakeni engu-2008.
FilmsPage.theBigShortDescription: Ibali elinolaka lokuchaza ingcikivane ethamba lababaholi abakuqagela nokuzuza ekuwahlukanisweni kwemakethe yezindlu ngo-2008.
FilmsPage.theWolfOfWallStreetDescription: Ibali elingathandwa lingomeleli oyinkululekile u-Jordan Belfort, umthengisi wama-stock owabulala ama-investimu amaphansi kanti aze aba nobomi obukodwa.
FilmsPage.billionsDescription: Indrama ebalulekile mayelana nomphathi webhankhi oludalwa luthulela ohambisanayo nomunye umuntu oyibhikele.
FilmsPage.goldDescription: Okugxile ezweni elingokoqobo, umuntu otholakala izinto lokucela ngezindlela zonke omuntu othize izilwane zinokuhlukula emthini ophakeme.
FilmsPage.warDogsDescription: Abantu abambalwa bamuhla bayaqala ukuthatha unkulumo woluntu yabo abaqala baba umuntu othiza.
FilmsPage.uncutGemsDescription: Umuntu othile ovele ayifumene imikhombi ebizwa nge-diamond oqala ukulwa ngo-muntu obanzi ezibukeni zakhe.
FilmsPage.catchMeIfYouCanDescription: Ibali elingokoqobo lika-Frank Abagnale Jr., umuntu oqala ukugcina amabili nomuntu asizwa ephilela ophi.
FilmsPage.wecrashedDescription: Ibali elizindlunkulu elishaya lenkampani iWeWork nomuningi othize owakubeka itole.
FilmsPage.djangoUnchainedDescription: Umuntu othulisiwe emanzi umuntu othize uzwanela umuntu othambile emumbazo womuntu othize ozwanela.
FilmsPage.pulpFictionDescription: Amabali ane-layini azwanisayelana nomuntu othambile ethwini eliselana neTarantino.
FilmsPage.inglouriousBasterdsDescription: Iqembu lobantu abayejuda abazwanela ukubulala abafundisi bokuzuza engcikivane.
FilmsPage.kidulthoodDescription: Indlela ethambile yokubuka isizini esimbili sokuqala kwabantu abayizikali eNtshonalanga eYasinde.
FilmsPage.adulthoodDescription: Eminyakeni eyisithupha ngemuva kwezinto ze-Kidulthood, uSam uyotholakala esigebengu azofuna amalungelo akhe.
FilmsPage.brotherhoodDescription: Ingcubulezi yokugcina ethwini izumela u-Sam njengoba azama ukunqoba isizini sakhe.
FilmsPage.riseOfTheFootsoldierDescription: Ibali elingokoqobo lomlindi wobhamende othole kuguquka kube ngumuntu othambile esifundazweni saseEssex.
FilmsPage.topBoySummerhouseDescription: Ihlogo eliyingobozi lokusomizela abathubi betakela indima efulekile eHackney, East London.
FilmsPage.topBoyDescription: Amasandi ethu YouTube azulandelana nebhuku likaDushane noSully njengoba bakwanela uzwanela.
FilmsPage.peakyBlindersDescription: Indrama yomdlali wamalume imikhombi emininginingi yesikhatshana sesigidi samabhisikobho.
FilmsPage.snatchDescription: Inombolo ethambile yezikhulu zodlela, abathengisi bebhokisi abakucela nemali ethambile.
FilmsPage.lockStockAndTwoSmokingBarrelsDescription: Abange ezinhlamvu zenyawo bezethela emgwaqo emva kwemdlalo wekhadi olwaqalakala.
FilmsPage.breakingBadDescription: Umuntu othize okosistelini omzali ovele aqale ukulwa ngenkolelo eyobulala.
FilmsPage.betterCallSaulDescription: Inkambi yezibalo ye-Breaking Bad izumela uJimmy McGill ozulandelana u-Saul Goodman.
FilmsPage.elCaminoABreakingBadMovieDescription: Ngemuva kwezinto zeBraking Bad, uJesse Pinkman uyothulakala ezibukeni azama ukunqoba amalungelo akhe.
FilmsPage.interstellarDescription: Iqembu lobantu abazloni azwanela umkhakha wobuhle womuntu othambile emhlabeni.
FilmsPage.parasiteDescription: Umuntu othize ozwanela uhlobo lomuntu othambile ezibukeni.
FilmsPage.blackMirrorDescription: Ibali eliyintokozo yokuzulandelana nokubalula kompilo wabantu.
FilmsPage.oblivionDescription: Emhlabeni okhutshiwe, umuntu othambile ozwanela izithombe evele aze ayiqinise.
